meanings.sent1: The old house at the end of the street remained unvisited for years.
meanings.sent2: The unvisited park on the outskirts of town was overgrown with weeds.
meanings.sent3: The unvisited attic was rumored to be haunted by ghosts.
meanings.sent4: Her unvisited dreams were like hidden treasures waiting to be discovered.
meanings.sent5: The unvisited path through the forest was shrouded in mystery and intrigue.

meanings.definition: Not having been seen or experienced.
meanings.sent1: The unvisited country held secrets unknown to the rest of the world.
meanings.sent2: The unvisited museum stored ancient artifacts untouched by human hands.
meanings.sent3: The unvisited flavors of exotic cuisine tempted her taste buds.
meanings.sent4: His unvisited memories lay dormant, waiting to resurface.
meanings.sent5: The unvisited landscapes in her mind painted a vivid picture of the unknown.
